original_title: WEATHER MTAANI | KAA RADA NA WEATHER | PLAN YOUR BUSINESS ACCORDING TO THE WEATHER
overview: The metereological department in Kenya is working with other ministries to provide weather education in order to save lives and property. Weather conditions can impact businesses negatively when not considered in their planning. The information shared by the metereological department helps its citizens to be prepared for the rains and to safe guard their businesses according to the forecasted weather.
tagline: Stephen Okoth, Kevin Obulo, Thomas Bwire
title: WEATHER MTAANI | KAA RADA NA WEATHER | PLAN YOUR BUSINESS ACCORDING TO THE WEATHER
